problem_names:
lemma weakEmptyTrans[simp]:
  fixes P :: ccs

  shows "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P"

lemma weakTransCases[consumes 1, case_names Base Step]:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "\<lbrakk>\<alpha> = \<tau>; P = P'\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> Prop (\<tau>) P"
  and     "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<Longrightarrow> Prop \<alpha> P'"

  shows "Prop \<alpha> P'"

lemma weakCongTransitionWeakTransition:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

lemma transitionWeakTransition:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

lemma weakAction:
  fixes a :: name
  and   P :: ccs

  shows "\<alpha>.(P) \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P"

lemma weakSum1:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   Q  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "P \<noteq> P'"

  shows "P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

lemma weakSum2:
  fixes Q  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   Q' :: ccs
  and   P  :: ccs

  assumes "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"
  and     "Q \<noteq> Q'"

  shows "P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"

lemma weakPar1:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   Q  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q"

lemma weakPar2:
  fixes Q  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   Q' :: ccs
  and   P  :: ccs

  assumes "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P \<parallel> Q'"

lemma weakSync:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   Q  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^(coAction \<alpha>) \<prec> Q'"
  and     "\<alpha> \<noteq> \<tau>"

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q'"

lemma weakRes:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   x  :: name

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "x \<sharp> \<alpha>"

  shows "\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P'"

lemma weakRepl:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<parallel> !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "P' \<noteq> P \<parallel> !P"

  shows "!P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
translations:
lemma weakEmptyTrans[simp]:
  fixes P :: ccs

  shows "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P
by(auto simp add: weakTrans_def)

lemma weakTransCases[consumes 1, case_names Base Step]:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "\<lbrakk>\<alpha> = \<tau>; P = P'\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> Prop (\<tau>) P"
  and     "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<Longrightarrow> Prop \<alpha> P'"

  shows "Prop \<alpha> P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Prop \<alpha> P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'
  \<lbrakk>\<alpha> = \<tau>; P = P'\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> Prop (\<tau>) P
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<Longrightarrow> Prop \<alpha> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Prop \<alpha> P'
by(auto simp add: weakTrans_def)

lemma weakCongTransitionWeakTransition:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'
by(auto simp add: weakTrans_def)

lemma transitionWeakTransition:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'
by(auto dest: transitionWeakCongTransition weakCongTransitionWeakTransition)

lemma weakAction:
  fixes a :: name
  and   P :: ccs

  shows "\<alpha>.(P) \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<alpha>.P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P
by(auto simp add: weakTrans_def intro: weakCongAction)

lemma weakSum1:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   Q  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "P \<noteq> P'"

  shows "P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'
  P \<noteq> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'
by(auto simp add: weakTrans_def intro: weakCongSum1)

lemma weakSum2:
  fixes Q  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   Q' :: ccs
  and   P  :: ccs

  assumes "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"
  and     "Q \<noteq> Q'"

  shows "P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'
  Q \<noteq> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'
by(auto simp add: weakTrans_def intro: weakCongSum2)

lemma weakPar1:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   Q  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel>
    Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel>
    Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q
by(auto simp add: weakTrans_def intro: weakCongPar1)

lemma weakPar2:
  fixes Q  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   Q' :: ccs
  and   P  :: ccs

  assumes "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'"

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P \<parallel> Q'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel>
    Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P \<parallel> Q'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> Q'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel>
    Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P \<parallel> Q'
by(auto simp add: weakTrans_def intro: weakCongPar2)

lemma weakSync:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   Q  :: ccs

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^(coAction \<alpha>) \<prec> Q'"
  and     "\<alpha> \<noteq> \<tau>"

  shows "P \<parallel> Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel>
    Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'
  Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^coAction \<alpha> \<prec> Q'
  \<alpha> \<noteq> \<tau>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel>
    Q \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<tau> \<prec> P' \<parallel> Q'
by(auto simp add: weakTrans_def intro: weakCongSync)

lemma weakRes:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs
  and   x  :: name

  assumes "P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "x \<sharp> \<alpha>"

  shows "\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'
  x \<sharp> \<alpha>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P'
by(auto simp add: weakTrans_def intro: weakCongRes)

lemma weakRepl:
  fixes P  :: ccs
  and   \<alpha>  :: act
  and   P' :: ccs

  assumes "P \<parallel> !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'"
  and     "P' \<noteq> P \<parallel> !P"

  shows "!P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'
using assms

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<parallel> !P \<Longrightarrow>\<^sup>^\<alpha> \<prec> P'
  P' \<noteq> P \<parallel> !P

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. !P \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'
by(auto simp add: weakTrans_def intro: weakCongRepl)
end
